extendedInfo.detail: Salisbury steak in home-style gravy with mashed potatoes, green beans and a brownie.  Per 1 Package: 590 calories; 10 g sat. fat (50% DV); 1630 mg sodium (71% DV); 16 g total sugars. 21 g protein.  A complete meal that satisfies. Rich chocolate brownie. Two Salisbury steak patties. Savory mashed potatoes. Cut green beans. SmartLabel: Scan or call 1-800-719-5859 for more food information.  Questions or comments? 1-800-719-5859; www.hungry-man.com.

extendedInfo.directions: For Food Safety & Quality: Keep frozen. Do not thaw. Microwave directions developed with 1100-watt microwave ovens. Appliances vary. Adjust cooking times as needed. Food must be cooked thoroughly to 165 degrees F. Microwave Oven: Cook only one at a time. 1. Remove film from brownie. Slit film over steaks. Cook on high 4-1/2 minutes. 2. Carefully remove brownie with a fork; set aside. Stir potatoes and rearrange steaks; re-cover film. 3.Cook an additional 4 minutes. 4. Check that food is cooked thoroughly. Handle Carefully. Its hot! Let stand 1 minute; stir potatoes and enjoy! Conventional Oven: Do not prepare in toaster oven. Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Remove film from brownie. Slit film over steaks. Cook on baking sheet in center of oven 40 to 45 minutes. Check that food is cooked thoroughly. Handle carefully; It's Hot! Let stand 2 minutes; stir potatoes and enjoy!  Keep frozen.
